content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The idea is to test Fortnite, Unreal Engine, and other EG products in 12 languages, namely Russia, Polish, Spanish, Mexican Spanish, Brazilian Portuguese, German, French, Turkish, Arabic, Korean, Japanese, Chinese.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The team is distributed all over the world and has their own scope for the language. E.g. we also check voice overs, subtitles, news articles, etc.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Challenges:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Extremely high expectations re linguistic experience, grammar\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"REALLY multicultural and multi-location team ( from Shenzhen, China, to Vancouver, Canada)\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Spoken language - English\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":131894,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/95c1c1b2-3874-4982-ae9b-6a6917f9a77e/12.JPG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/95c1c1b2-3874-4982-ae9b-6a6917f9a77e/12.JPG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"12.JPG\",\"name\":\"12.JPG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"95c1c1b2-3874-4982-ae9b-6a6917f9a77e\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1029,\"height\":303.3140495867769},\"extension\":\"JPG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
